examples.content: How can I generate a video using the MiniMax API?

You can generate a video by sending a POST request to the MiniMax API endpoint with your desired prompt and model parameters. For example, use the 'video-01' model and include your prompt in the JSON payload to create a video based on that description.
Can you show me a curl example to generate a video with the prompt 'A futuristic city at sunset'?

Certainly! Here's a curl command:
curl --location 'https://api.minimaxi.chat/v1/video_generation' \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--header 'authorization: Bearer ${api_key}' \
--data '{
  "model": "video-01",
  "prompt": "A futuristic city at sunset"
}'
What kind of responses should I expect from the API?

The API typically responds with a JSON object containing a video URL or an identifier for the generated video. You can then use this URL to view or download the video content created based on your prompt.
